page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our block is a mainly residential suburb of Manchester and Stockport.It contains large shopping centres and good leisure and sports facilities. Manchester has both a university and polytechnic so the area has lots of teachers, lecturers and students. Communications within the block are excellent , with most main roads leading into the centres of the towns.There is also a motorway on the edge of the area.There are industrial estates especially in the Stockport suburb.There are both private dwellings and council housing.
